name: BirthdaySkill

”Alexa open the birthday reminder”
”Alexa open birthday reminder”
”Alexa birthday reminder”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: birthday reminder
Developer Terms of Use
des: Open by saying, Alexa open "birthday".So basically you ask Alexa to to ask your birth date and also it remembers your birthday ,and wishes you on your birthday.It is a very basic Alexa skill which i built as a begineer and also this skill doesnt require any external hardware .
